lead_paragraph: With the starting forward Elton Brand sidelined with a ruptured left Achilles’ tendon, the Los Angeles Clippers added frontcourt depth yesterday by signing the former North Carolina State forward Josh Powell. Powell, 23, averaged 10.8 points and 9.8 rebounds in five games last month for Golden State’s team in the N.B.A. Summer League in Las Vegas.
